review: Bought the Firestick TV 5 days ago. Great on the install. But has Been FIVE days now on the hookup and STILL TRYING TO GET IT TO WORK RIGHT! Finally had a Wave Broadband Tech come out and he did things the average joe is not going to know.....for example, the Firestick kept trying to tell me I had a password on my home wifi....which I didn't ( I didn't have one when the first Wave Tech came out and installed broadband) so I kept trying a password because hey, maybe I did have one. I was locked out of using it til we reset my wifi with a password and Firestick STILL didn't get the message until he tweeked it again by changing the Wireless Network Name ever so slightly .  So, for all you who read the install and hook up are a piece of cake, beware.  It may not work out that way for you and you best have somebody with real knowledge on these things. Day six, Firestick has stopped working again.  I have to spend at least 30 minutes on hold for every call to Wave and emails take 24 hours for a response.....its not all its cracked up to be.  Install was easy.  "THE HOOKUP IS WAY TOO INTENSIVE AND FRUSTRATING" has been my experience.
